track.name: Niagara Falls (Foot or 2) [with Travis Scott & 21 Savage]

wiki.summary: On “Niagara Falls (Foot or 2),” Travis Scott and 21 Savage rap over an eerie, psychedelic beat from Metro Boomin about their lavish lifestyles and women in their life, speaking on their ever-expanding empires that may need a “foot or two” added on to them. The track was first previewed by CHASE B and Travis Scott during show Season 2 Episode 3 of their Apple Music Radio .WAV RADIO on October 7, 2020. On November 30, 2022, over two years after the song was originally teased Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: On “Niagara Falls (Foot or 2),” Travis Scott and 21 Savage rap over an eerie, psychedelic beat from Metro Boomin about their lavish lifestyles and women in their life, speaking on their ever-expanding empires that may need a “foot or two” added on to them. The track was first previewed by CHASE B and Travis Scott during show Season 2 Episode 3 of their Apple Music Radio .WAV RADIO on October 7, 2020. On November 30, 2022, over two years after the song was originally teased, the song was revealed to be on Metro Boomin’s sophomore album, HEROES & VILLAINS. Read more on Last.fm.
